  • Constructed from slow-recovery foam,the disposable earplug conforms to the shape of the ear canal for excellent hearing protection.

    Origin Country United States

    Size One size

  • The slow recovery foam used to create these ear plugs, provides a flame resistant, moisture resistant and sound resistant barrier for the ear canal, alo

    • Product Information

  • Sweat and moisture-resistant for use in humid environments
  • One size fits most
  • Cylindrical shape creates a snug seal for noise reduction
  • Noise Reduction Rating (NRR)*: 29 dB
  • CSA Class AL
  • Test compatible with 3M E-A-Rfit Validation System

entry.title: 3M MT7H79F-01 - Mt7H79F-01 Gb Headset Hi-Viz Mt7H79F-01 7100003168
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 447.12

[shortdesc]

MT7H79F-01 GB HEADSET HI-VIZ

  • This versatile ground mechanic headset helps provide clear, concise ground crew communications and reliable hearing protection during ground support operations
  • The soft earcup cushions are filled with liquid foam for extended wear and comfort.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Sweden

    Product Information

  • 3M Peltor`s 2-way communication headsets are designed for industrial users working in high noise environments
  • They offer versatility along with the protection, durability and comfort that you expect from a worldwide leader in communication headsets.
  • These ground mechanic headsets feature:
  • Bright neon ear cups
  • Noise-canceling boom microphone with integral amplifier
  • Padded headband
  • Durable plug assemblies
  • NRR 25 dB*
  • *The NRR may overestimate the hearing protection provided during typical use
  • 3M recommends reducing the NRR by 50% for estimating the amount of noise reduction provided.
  • 3M is Leading the Advancement of Hearing Conservation™.
    		•

entry.title: 3M Peltor 393-3003-2 - Peltor Earmuff Probed Test Cushions x3 7100062127
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Communications
Price: 37.11

[shortdesc]

3M Peltor Earmuff Probed Test Cushions X3, 393-3003-2

  • 3M™ Peltor™ Earmuff Probed Test Cushions X3 easily snap into the 3M™ Peltor™ X-Series X3 Earmuffs (sold separately) to allow for fit testing with the 3M™ E-A-Rfit Dual-Ear Validation System
  • The complete system issues a pass or fail rating based on the employee's personal attenuation rating (PAR) when wearing 3M™ Peltor™ X-Series X3 Earmuffs.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Peltor
    Color Black
    Origin Country Poland
    Product Type Communications
    Size One size

    Extra Product Information

  • These cushions are used specifically with the 3M™ Peltor™ X Series X3 Earmuffs to help employers determine what level of hearing conservation protection the earmuffs are providing
  • Adapter clips hold microphones next to earmuffs for proper positioning dur

    • Product Information

  • Can be cleaned with hygiene wipes and reused
  • Adapter clips hold microphones next to earmuffs during testing
  • For use with the 3M E-A-Rfit Dual-Ear Validation System and 3M Peltor Earmuffs X-Series X3
  • Snaps into employee's own earmuffs enabling fit test
    		•
